oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photographic album
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The photographic album belonged to the Chamberlain and Sullivan families of Macon County, Tennessee. The album includes CdVs of Union generals, officers and civilians. The subjects include Adm. David D. Porter, Gen. John Ellis Wool, Sec. of War Edwin Stanton, Gov. William Sprague, Gen. James Shields, Gen. Winfield Scott, Gen. James S. Wadsworth, Gen. Peter J. Osterhaus, Gen. Edward Ord, Gen. William S. Rosecrans, two unidentified women and an unidentified US Army officer.
